page.title: 10NEW BY-PASS FOR CLOPHILL
page.content:
In October{1983}a new road was opened which by-passed{Clophill High Street}& took all the heavy traffic to{Ampthill &{Shefford.}We had been taking a census of traffic travelling through {Clophill}when there was an accident which closed the{by-pass}for half a day. This enabled us to make a comparative study of the{traffic flow along the High Street.
The average number of{cars & lorries per hour on a{normal day}was{108
The average number of{cars & lorries per hour{during the accident}was{235
The amount of other traffic such as {bicycles & tractors}was seemingly unaffected as it remained at an average of{29}per hour.
